full_summary:
### Request for Proposals (RFP) for Leased Office Space (Stratford, Ontario)
#### Government of Canada Tender Announcement

**Title:** Request for Proposals (RFP) for Leased Office Space (Stratford, Ontario)
**Reference Number:** PW-22-01010960
**Solicitation Number:** 2022-CU-004
**Publication Date:** 2022-10-24
**Tender Closing Date:** 2022-11-18T15:00:00

**About Farm Credit Canada (FCC):** As Canada’s leading agriculture and food lender, FCC is committed to supporting the future of Canadian agriculture and food. With a loan portfolio of over $44 billion, FCC provides flexible and competitively priced financing, management software, information, and knowledge to the agriculture and food industry.

**RFP Scope:**
FCC is seeking to lease approximately 6,000 – 7,000 usable square feet of office space in Stratford, ON. The lease arrangements are intended to commence for a period of five (5) years, with options for two (2) additional five (5) year extensions.

**Request for Proposal Process:**
• RFP issue date: 2022-10-21
• Questions from vendors accepted until: 2022-10-28
• RFP closing date and time: 2022-11-18T15:00:00

**Key Considerations:**

• The RFP is a non-binding, competitive process; FCC is not obligated to proceed with the work described in the RFP scope.
• FCC’s procurement process allows for negotiation between FCC and one or more vendors prior to awarding a contract.
• Vendors must request the RFP document through FCC’s designated RFP contact.

**Contact Information:**
• Chris Ugochukwu, Procurement and Vendor Manager, FCC
• E-mail: [procurement@fcc.ca](mailto:procurement@fcc.ca)

**Note:**
• Vendors do not receive the RFP document by registering for the list of interested suppliers on the [Buyandsell.gc.ca](http://buyandsell.gc.ca) website.
• Vendors must contact FCC’s designated RFP contact to request the RFP document.

Readers may access the original document for complete details and requirements regarding the RFP. <https://buyandsell.gc.ca/helpdeskssite?oid=105069>
